name: Morkva Nova Post
author: MORKVA

sections.description:
NOVA POST works for EU companies for domestic deliveries, Europe-wide or EU-to-Ukraine deliveries.
Sign up for an account and API here: https://novapost.com/
The plugin will allow the use of address autocomplete on the checkout page. You will need an API key first (you could use you Nova Poshta API key for this too)

3rd party service

Our plugin is relying on a 3rd party as a service to get branch data Nova Post
https://api-stage.novapost.pl/v.1.0/
https://api.novapost.com/v.1.0/
Privacy policy: https://novapost.com/en-hu/more/privacy-policy

Plugin uses Nova Post API
https://api.novapost.pl/developers/index.html#overview
sections.faq:
Will it work with checkout blocks?

No, the plugin currently works only with default [woocommerce_checkout] shortcode.

short_description: Nova Post - European delivery service in Germany, Moldova, Latvia, Estonia, Lithuania, Poland, Romania, Slovakia, Czech, Italy, Hungary.
